/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with red and white signs, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of complexity to the scene. Cars and buses are seen moving along the street, indicating a busy day in the city. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the energy and vibrancy of the city.
